sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevSafeUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevSafeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var DevSafeUtils = Class.create();
DevSafeUtils.prototype = {

    initialize: function(updateSet_gr) {
        this.CURRENT = updateSet_gr
        this.TOKEN = gs.getProperty('devsafe.githib.token');
        this.GITURI = gs.getProperty('devsafe.githib.uri');
        this.exportedBy = gs.getUserID();
        this.exportedBy_email = gs.getUser().getRecord().getValue('email');
        this.FILENAME = encodeURIComponent(updateSet_gr.getValue('name') + "_" + updateSet_gr.getDisplayValue('application')) + '.xml';
        this.debug = true;
    },

    syncMultipleRecords: function() {

        var filter = gs.getProperty('devsafe.multiple_record_sync.filter');
        var localUpdateSets = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
        localUpdateSets.addEncodedQuery(filter);
        localUpdateSets.query();
        while (localUpdateSets.next()) {
            this.CURRENT = localUpdateSets
            this.syncSingleRecord();
        }
    },

    syncSingleRecord: function() {
        var syncStatus = 'failed';

        if (this.CURRENT) {
            try {

                // Generate temp retrieved update set based on local update set
                var grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.initialize();
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.description = this.CURRENT.description;
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.name = this.CURRENT.name;
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.release_date = this.CURRENT.release_date;
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.remote_sys_id = this.CURRENT.sys_id;
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.application = this.CURRENT.application;
                grRetrievedUpdateSet.state = "loaded";


                var grScope = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
                grScope.get(this.CURRENT.application);

                if (grScope.isValid()) {
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_name = grScope.name;
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_scope = grScope.scope;
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_version = grScope.version;
                }

                var sysidRetrieved;

                if (sysidRetrieved = grRetrievedUpdateSet.insert()) {

                    // Generate Updates for Temp Retrieved Update sets
                    var grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
                    grUpdateXML.addQuery('update_set', this.CURRENT.getUniqueValue());
                    grUpdateXML.query();

                    while (grUpdateXML.next()) {
                        grUpdateXML.remote_update_set = sysidRetrieved;
                        grUpdateXML.update_set = '';
                        grUpdateXML.insert();
                    }


                    this._loggit('syncSingleRecord.FILENAME: ' + this.FILENAME);
                    syncStatus = this._uploadUpdateSetToGithub(sysidRetrieved);

                    // Remove Temporary Retrieved UpdateSets

                    grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
                    grUpdateXML.addQuery('remote_update_set', sysidRetrieved);
                    grUpdateXML.query();
                    grUpdateXML.deleteMultiple();
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet.get(sysidRetrieved);
                    grRetrievedUpdateSet.deleteRecord();
                }
            } catch (err) {
                this._loggit('syncSingleRecord.error: ' + err);
            }
        } else {
            this._loggit('syncSingleRecord.noCurrent: ' + this.CURRENT);
        }
        return syncStatus;
    },


    // Upload Function
    _uploadUpdateSetToGithub: function(retrievedUpdateSet) {
        var uploadStatus;
        this._loggit('_uploadUpdateSetToGithub.retrievedUpdateSet: ' + retrievedUpdateSet);
        try {

            this._loggit('_uploadUpdateSetToGithub.URI: ' + this.GITURI + this.FILENAME)

            // check if Update Set already exists
            var response = this._gitAPI('GET', this.GITURI + this.FILENAME)

            // Get bse64 of update set
            var b64Content = GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(this._buildUpdateSetXML(retrievedUpdateSet).toString())

            // Build body of rest call
            var body = {
                "message": "Creating snow-update-set-sync...",
                "committer": {
                    "name": this.exportedBy,
                    "email": this.exportedBy_email
                },
                "content": b64Content
            };

            if (response.status == 200)
                body.sha = response.body.sha.toString();

            // Push update set to GitHub
            var getRec = this._gitAPI("PUT", this.GITURI + this.FILENAME, body);
            if (getRec.status = '200') {
                uploadStatus = 'successful';
            } else {
                uploadStatus = 'failed';
            }

        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('_uploadUpdateSetToGithub.error: ' + err);
            uploadStatus = 'failed';
        }
        return uploadStatus;
    },

    _buildUpdateSetXML: function(set) {

        try {

            // get Retrieved Update set
            var tempRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
            tempRetrievedUpdateSet.get(set);
            var parentpdateSetXml = this._getXML(tempRetrievedUpdateSet);

            // get child updates
            var childUpdateSetXml = this._getChildUpdates(tempRetrievedUpdateSet.sys_id.toString());

            // format XML to be retrieved
            var replaceThis = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>';
            var withThat = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><unload unload_date="' + GlideSysDateUtil.getUMTDateTimeString() + '">';
            parentpdateSetXml = parentpdateSetXml.replace(replaceThis, withThat);

            // Combine the updates and update set into one.
            var updateSetXml = parentpdateSetXml + childUpdateSetXml + '</unload>';

            return updateSetXml;
        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('_buildUpdateSetXML.error: ' + err);
        }
    },


    _getXML: function(record) {
        try {

            var xml = new GlideRecordXMLSerializer();
            var xmlString = xml.serialize(record);
            return xmlString;
        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('_getXML.error: ' + err);
        }
    },

    getAllSets: function() {
        var allSets = false;
        try {
            var allSets = this._gitAPI("GET", this.GITURI);
        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('getAllSets.error: ' + err);
        }
        return allSets;
    },

    getOneSet: function() {
        var URI = this.getParameter(sysparm_gitURI)
        this._loggit('getOneSet.URI: ' + URI)

        var foundIt = this.getSetFromGitHub(URI);
        this._loggit('getOneSet.foundIt: ' + foundIt)

        return foundIt;

    },

    checkForUpdateOfExistingLocalSet: function() {

        var foundIt = false;
        var URI;

        this._loggit('checkForUpdateOfExistingLocalSet.FILENAME: ' +  this.FILENAME)
        var newSet = false
        var setObj = this.getAllSets();
        var allSets = setObj.body
        gs.info(JSON.stringify(allSets))
        // If update set is found
        for (set in allSets) {
            var setName = allSets[set].name
            if (setName == this.FILENAME) {
                this._loggit('checkForUpdateOfExistingLocalSet.setName: ' + setName)
                URI = allSets[set].git_url
            }
        }

        foundIt = this.getSetFromGitHub(URI);

        return foundIt;

    },

    getSetFromGitHub: function(gitURI) {
        var newSet = false
        var setXML = new XMLDocument(this._gitSetXML(gitURI));

        if (setXML) {
            newSet = this._createNewRetrievedUpdateSetFromXMLdoc(setXML)
        }

        return newSet;

    },

    _gitSetXML: function(setURI) {
        var response = this._gitAPI("GET", setURI);
        var b64Content = response.body.content.replace(/(?:\r\n|\r|\n)/g, '');
        var xmlContent = GlideStringUtil.base64Decode(b64Content);
        return xmlContent;
    },

    _gitAPI: function(method, URI, body) {

        var gitAPI = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        gitAPI.setHttpMethod(method);
        gitAPI.setEndpoint(URI);
        gitAPI.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + this.TOKEN);
        if (body)
            gitAPI.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));

        var response = gitAPI.execute();

        if (response.getStatusCode() == '200') {
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.response: ' + response.getBody());
        } else {
            var errorMessage = response.getBody()
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.response: ' + response.getBody());
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.getErrorMessage: ' + response.getErrorMessage());
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.haveError: ' + response.haveError());
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.getErrorCode: ' + response.getErrorCode());
            this._loggit('_gitAPI.getStatusCode: ' + response.getStatusCode());

        }

        return {
            'status': response.getStatusCode(),
            'body': JSON.parse(response.getBody())
        };
    },

    _createNewRetrievedUpdateSetFromXMLdoc: function(xmlDoc) {

        // Create Retrieved Update Set
        var newRetrievedUpdateSet_sysId = false;
        try {

            var newRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set')
            newRetrievedUpdateSet.initialize();

            // Get elements
            var RUSFields = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
            RUSFields.addEncodedQuery("nameSTARTSWITHsys_remote_update_set^element!=NULL");
            RUSFields.query();

            //populate elements from XML 
            while (RUSFields.next()) {
                var elementName = RUSFields.element;
                var elementValue = xmlDoc.getNodeText("//unload/sys_remote_update_set[1]/" + RUSFields.element);

                if (elementValue && elementName != 'remote_update_set') {
                    newRetrievedUpdateSet[elementName] = elementValue;
                }
            }

            // Insert record
            newRetrievedUpdateSet_sysId = newRetrievedUpdateSet.insert();

        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('_createNewRemoteUpdateSet.error.newRetrievedUpdateSet: ' + err);

        }

        // Create Updates
        var set = 0;
        while (true) {
            set++
            try {
                if (xmlDoc.getNodeText("//unload/sys_update_xml[" + set + "]/name")) {

                    // Get all elements of update table
                    var newUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml')
                    newUpdate.initialize();

                    // Get elements
                    var updateFields = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
                    updateFields.addEncodedQuery("nameSTARTSWITHsys_update_xml^element!=NULL");
                    updateFields.query();

                    //populate elements from XML 
                    while (updateFields.next()) {
                        var elementName = updateFields.element;
                        var elementValue = xmlDoc.getNodeText("//unload/sys_update_xml[" + set + "]/" + updateFields.element)

                        if (elementValue && elementName != 'remote_update_set') {
                            newUpdate[elementName] = elementValue;
                        }
                    }
                    newUpdate.remote_update_set = newRetrievedUpdateSet_sysId

                    // Insert Record
                    var newUpdateRec = newUpdate.insert();

                } else {
                    set--
                    break;
                }

            } catch (err) {
                this._loggit('_createNewRemoteUpdateSet.error.newUpdate: ' + err);
                break;
            }
        }
        return newRetrievedUpdateSet_sysId;
    },

    _getChildUpdates: function(parentSet) {
        try {

            var updatesXML;
            var updates = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
            updates.query('remote_update_set', parentSet);
            while (updates.next()) {
                if (updatesXML)
                    updatesXML += this._getXML(updates).replace('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>', '');
                else
                    updatesXML = this._getXML(updates).replace('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>', '');
            }
            return updatesXML;
        } catch (err) {
            this._loggit('_getChildUpdates.error: ' + err);
        }
    },

    _loggit: function(message) {
        if (this.debug) {
            gs.info('DevSafe: ' + message);
        }

    },

    type: 'DevSafeUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-12 14:03:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>102</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevSafeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-17 21:01:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

$scope.data.filter += query; $scope.setSearch(); } // Makes Widget Async var title = $scope.data.title; if ($scope.options.use_instance_title == 'true') title = $scope.options.title; $scope.data = $scope.options; $scope.data.title = title; initRecordWatcher($scope.data.table, $scope.data.filter); }); function parseQuery(table, queryString){ return $http.post('/api/now/sp/parsequery/' + table, queryString).then(function(response){ return response.data.result; }); } c.createQueryTerm = function(table, field, sys_id, operator){ return $http.get('/api/now/sp/getInOutQueryTerm', { params: { table: table, sys_id: sys_id, field: field, operator: operator } }).then(function(response){ if (response && response.data && response.data.result) return response.data.result.parts; }); $contextMenu.css({ position: 'absolute', top: 0, height: scrollHeight, left: 0, right: 0, zIndex: 9999 }); $('body').append($contextMenu); $ul = angular.element('
    ', { 'class': 'dropdown-menu', 'role': 'menu' }); renderItems(); $contextMenu.append($ul); function renderItems(){ angular.forEach(items, function (item) { var $li = angular.element('
  • '); if (item === null) { $li.addClass('divider'); } else { var $a = angular.element(''); $a.attr({tabindex: '-1', href:'#'}); $a.text(item[0]); $li.append($a); $li.on('click', function (e) { e.preventDefault(); scope.$apply(function () { _clearContextMenus(e); item[1].call(item, item); }); }); } $ul.append($li); }); } } function _clearContextMenus(event){ if (!event){ return; } angular.element(event.currentTarget).removeClass('context'); var els = angular.element(".context-dropdown"); angular.forEach(els, function(el){ angular.element(el).remove(); }); } var contextMenuItemHeight = 0; function setContextMenuPosition(event){ if (contextMenuItemHeight === 0) contextMenuItemHeight = $ul.children(0).height(); // Why not just call .width() and .height() on the container? Because those calculations cause browsers to reflow // that can cause IE10 to take 200ms to render a context menu. var cmWidth = 150; var cmHeight = contextMenuItemHeight * $ul.children().length; var startX = event.pageX + cmWidth >= window.innerWidth ? event.pageX - cmWidth : event.pageX; var startY = event.pageY + cmHeight >= window.innerHeight ? event.pageY - cmHeight : event.pageY; $ul.css({ display: 'block', position: 'absolute', left: startX, top: startY, 'min-width': cmWidth }); } }]]>Copy of Data Tablefalsesnc_external,snc_internalfalsesp_widgetbrent.llewellyn2018-01-17 15:25:23true0676b5dcdb33c300497856f3ce9619060Copy of Data Tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_0676b5dcdb33c300497856f3ce961906brent.llewellyn2018-01-17 15:25:23

sys_update_xml.payload: c.header-loader { float: left; width: 24px; position: relative; top: 24px; } .cart-dropdown { width: 350px; padding: 0; border-top-left-radius: 4px !important; border-top-right-radius: 4px !important; ul { max-height: 300px; overflow: auto; } .subtotal { display: block; } .item-image { padding: 0; margin: 0; text-align: center; max-width:100%; height:auto; } label, p { padding: 0; margin: 0; } .media { padding: 0; margin: 0; } .media-left > a { display: block; width: 48px; max-width: 48px; } .media-body { label { font-weight: bold; } } li.media { border-top: 1px solid #cccccc; padding: 1rem; } .panel { margin: 0; } .panel .panel-body { padding: 0; } .btn-clear { color: #333; background-color: #fff; } p.quantity-price { padding-top: 0.5rem; span { color: #777; padding-right: 0.5rem; } } .align-right { text-align: right; } } .item-added-tooltip { width: 184px; font-size: 14px; }sp_instance_menutitlefalsefalseDevSafe Header Menutruefalsesp_widgetadmin2018-01-16 02:04:47trueb4a53d37dba38300497856f3ce9619b52DevSafe Header Menuglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_b4a53d37dba38300497856f3ce9619b5admin2018-01-16 02:06:49

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d654d65cdb73c300497856f3ce9619f0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevSafeAjaxUtil</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>DevSafeAjaxUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var DevSafeAjaxUtil = Class.create();
DevSafeAjaxUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {


    getOneSet: function() {
		var DSU = new DevSafeUtils();
    	var URI = this.getParameter(sysparm_gitURI);
		
        DSU._loggit('DevSafeAjaxUtil.getOneSet.URI: '+URI);

        var foundIt = DSU.getSetFromGitHub(URI);
        DSU._loggit('DevSafeAjaxUtil.getOneSet.foundIt: '+foundIt);
        
        return foundIt;

    },
    type: 'DevSafeAjaxUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-17 17:42:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d654d65cdb73c300497856f3ce9619f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevSafeAjaxUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d654d65cdb73c300497856f3ce9619f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-17 17:50:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_74b85adcdb73c300497856f3ce961963
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="DELETE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getOneSet</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
	// implement resource here
	var URI = String(request.queryParams.gitURI);
	gs.log('DevSafeAPI.URI: '+URI)
	var DSU = new DevSafeUtils();
	
	DSU._loggit('DevSafeAjaxUtil.getOneSet.URI: '+URI);
	
	var foundIt = DSU.getSetFromGitHub(URI);
	DSU._loggit('DevSafeAjaxUtil.getOneSet.foundIt: '+foundIt);
	
	return foundIt;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/devsafe/devsafeapi</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-17 17:56:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>74b85adcdb73c300497856f3ce961963</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getOneSet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_74b85adcdb73c300497856f3ce961963</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-17 18:01:14</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="DevSafeAPI">ad5896dcdb73c300497856f3ce961962</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
